name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Domino Tabs: Social Profile Bulk URL Opener

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens social profile URLs in new tabs gradually

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Domino Tabs - The Social Profile Bulk URL Opener, is a simple Chrome extension customized to help Recruiters and Talent Sourcers by enhancing their browser experience and boosting productivity when dealing with large lists of social profiles (i.e from spreadsheets).

-Efficiently opens up to 25 Social Profile URLs in separate tabs like a "chain reaction" in the background, conserving computing power and preventing system freezes.

- The distinctive "domino-like" feature allows Recruiters and Sourcers more rapid review of the fully-loaded tabs while other URL's seamlessly launch in the background.

- Ensuring efficiency, each profile launches in a new tab in the background ONLY AFTER the previous one has loaded completely.

To use: 

- Simply paste a list of up to 25 Social Profile URLs into the input box (LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Github, etc.) and the extension will open each Profile URL in a new tab gradually like dominos.  

Don't let excessive tabs slow you down.  Accelerate your work and minimize time wasted waiting for profiles to load with Domino Tabs. 

Created with love 
by Talent Sourcer and Sourcing Tool Creator Mike Santoro
"For Love of Sourcers and Sourcing"
Connect Here: www.linkedin.com/in/michaelsantoro-recruiter
